Responses to inquiries may take time, and we may refrain from responding to inquiries related to content such as game strategies and tips.

Customer support is only available in Japanese. We apologize for the inconvenience.

-As customer support for this game is handled by applibot, inc., all inquiries will be sent to applibot, inc.

-Player IDs can be copied from the in-game Menu > Profile.
-When the input is successful, the item will be sent to the gift box.
-If player ID or gift code is incorrect, the gift will not be granted.
-Gift codes are irrevocable once used. Please check your ID information before using the gift code.
-Gift items may not be delivered to player accounts immediately; please allow for reasonable processing time.
-Gift codes are subject to the expiration date stated by Square Enix.
-Items in the gift box must be collected by the date stated by Square Enix.
-A gift code cannot be used more than once on the same account.
-If fraudulent activity is discovered, the subject account may be suspended.
